items.title: Mortgage rates hit 2025 low as homebuyers catch a break
items.description: Mortgage rates drop to their lowest point in 2025, offering potential relief for homebuyers in today's competitive housing market across the nation.

items.title: Trump narrows Fed chair picks, January decision expected
items.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's term ends in May 2026, but President Trump plans to pick his replacement by January.
